text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Hey, Producer.
Hm, what is it?
...Well...

...
Actually, it's nothing.

Haha, come on.
Now you've got me curious.

...I'm sorry.
It's really not a big deal, but...

Today, Chiyoko seemed so happy
talking about staying overnight at the dorm...

So...
I couldn't help but feel a little envious.
...I see.
Well, it's bound to be fun.

Eating dinner with Juri and Rinze, taking a bath, and
Chatting with everyone before bed... ───
Like during our training camp, huh?
Exactly.

I imagine Chiyoko is having enjoyable days
Just like during that camp...
...Did Natsuha want to stay overnight with everyone too?

.........
If I say "no", that would be a lie.

But I understand.
Chiyoko's home is far away, so she got permission to stay.

...That's why I won't be selfish.
I don't have a reason to stay overnight at the dorm.
